video:video.video:title: Defrag Tools #196 - Windows Defender Application Guard
video:video.video:description: In this episode of Defrag Tools, we discuss Windows Defender Application Guard, a great security feature in the Edge browser which allows you to easily run browser sessions in a virtual machine.

video:video.video:title: Defrag Tools #195 - Console Command Favorites

video:video.video:title: Defrag Tools #191 - HRESULT Error Codes
